# remove(_:)

**Instance Method**

Marks a context for removal.

## Declaration

```swift
func remove(_ context: CLSContext)
```

## Parameters

- **context**: The context to remove.

## Discussion

If your context hierarchy changes, either because your app’s content is dynamic, or as a result of an app update, you might need to remove old contexts from the data store. Call this method to mark a context for removal. Call the [doc://com.apple.classkit/documentation/ClassKit/CLSDataStore/save(completion:)] method to commit the change.

When you remove a context, the framework removes all of its decendants as well.
